name: Vital Rescue
description:
In VITAL Rescue, A Blob, I mean A green Jellified Creature was just wandering in the space. Then, Suddenly The most important VITAL Chips of the ship were fallen, fallen from the space to the mysterious Planet. Ya, Mysterious Planet!!! Actually, Not as much easy as mysterious, because The Mechanical Creatures or simply Robots, Love, ya Love eating Jellies!!!
So, I think You Now Got the task, You have to help our greenish BLOB to survive, and get those VITAL chips back, while traveling from one Portal to Other.
So, Be Mentally Prepared for the huge, 'Vital Rescue'.

features-
* many mysterious and puzzled levels to explore
* deadly robots wanna eat you
* amazing darkness with only one light source as you
* shootable jelly pops to knock-out those robots
* easy interface just collect vital chips and pass through portals
